column4: In older versions of Ubuntu there used to be a system app that would show the list of installed hardware. I can't find it in 9.04. I need to find out the driver that ubuntu is using for my webcam.
lsusb will tell you what your webcam is reported as, you can use lsmod and a clever grep to find the module, or driver it uses
thank you, any hints on the grep?
i wouldd issue something resembleing lsmod | grep <name of camera>
